Name: District 99
About the game: You need to become one of the members of the resistance squad and fight against foreign monsters. Play one of 3 types of missions, unlock new types of weapons and characters, collect collectible items. Features: • large open world. • 3 types of missions • large selection of weapons • various characters • collectibles
